content: {"locationId": "7826", "organizationId": "6503", "name": "Victoria Christian Assistance Ministry - VCAM", "address1": "108 North Liberty", "address2": null, "city": "Victoria", "state": "TX", "zipCode": "77901", "country": null, "phone": "361-572-0048", "phoneExt": null, "website": "www.vcamvictoria.org", "latitude": "28.7993969", "longitude": "-97.0045711", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "Established in 1986 as a Christian non-profit charitable organization, VCAM provides a broad range   of services that are typically requested of churches.  We operate as a safety net for families and individuals in crisis situations in our community.  We are primarily a volunteer-run organization", "notes": "Basic services include:   Supplementary food once monthly (based on family size);Basic needs once monthly (toilet tissue, shampoo, oral care);Special food and toiletry packages for the homeless; Clothing; Medical Equipment (walkers, canes, crutches) when available; Home Delivery to the disabled; and Referral to other charitable and community agencies as appropriate.   Financial Assistance provided in-house when funding is available includes: Payment of past due water or natural gas bills to avoid termination of services; Payment of non-narcotic prescription medications; Gasoline Vouchers for out-of-town medical appointments; Refillable Laundry Cards for Homeless Population.   Financial assistance for other services may be arranged collaboratively with  churches or agencies on a case-by-case basis as funding allows.", "contactName": "Marc A Hinojosa  Executive Director", "contactPhone": "361-572-0048", "contactEmail": "victoria.vcam@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "Family Closet Free Clothing Store", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 3, "regionName": "Vivery Network", "logoBlobNameSmall": "9d6f806b-b144-4a23-97ab-62ef7377b68d.png", "website": "http://www.vivery.org"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": [], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
